name: Timeless spacestation
description:
A 3D game meant to be about a person stuck on a spacestation that is running out of air. Didn't have time to add the win/lose condition, or the air supply, so sadly it is more like a walking sim in a space station. For all I know there could be some more development on this, but wouldn't count on it

Controls are:
WASD for movement.
Space to jump.
E to interact.
